metadata.title: CVE-2024-35984 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: i2c:smbus: fix NULL function pointer dereference Baruch reported an OOPS whenusing the designware controller as target only. Target-only modes break theassumption of one transfer function always being available. Fix this byalways checking the pointer in __i2c_transfer. [wsa: dropped thesimplification in core-smbus to avoid theoretical regressions]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
